name: Escape the Dungeon (VegeTato)
description:
-Make sure to press FULL SCREEN button-

Can you escape the Dungeon ?

its all about picking the Right time !

-Remember you can parkour between walls !

-You can grab the ledges

-Think FAST !

-Jump FASTER!

-A surprise if you achieved the end :o

-This game is made for  Fireside Jam-

This game is made in 2 days by me Solo dev :)

i joined the JAM late <.>  so i got 3 days (1day to think of the idea) and (2days) to make everything

Feedback is always appreciated <33

Note: This is my first ever finished game :D

Credits:

-Game is fully made in Gdevelop
